name: pertly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an attractively small and firm way: Her nose was turned pertly upwards. Her hair is pertly cut into a bob.
in a way that is humorous because it does not show much respect: When I asked her if she would help with the preparations she declined rather pertly. She smiled pertly at the assembled photographers.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a small man with large, prominent eyes and a pertly turned up nose.She arranged the cap so that it sat pertly on her dark curls.Rosa strode up to him and kissed him pertly on the mouth.
